channel.title: GitHub Solidity Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of Solidity in GitHub

item.title: OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts
item.description: OpenZeppelin Contracts is a library for secure smart contract development.

item.description: WTF Solidity 极简入门教程，供小白们使用。Now supports English! 官网: https://wtf.academy

item.description: The core Arbitrum Nitro contracts deployed to the parent chain to host the rollup

item.description: Bringing off-chain compute workloads to on-chain smart contracts.

item.description: A book on all things Foundry, available at https://book.getfoundry.sh.

item.description: Foundry library for deploying and managing upgradeable contracts

item.description: A collection of helpful contracts and libraries for use with Forge and Foundry

item.title: Uniswap/v2-periphery

item.description: 🦄 🦄 🦄 🦄 Core smart contracts of Uniswap v4
